name: Chiki's Chase
description:
Chiki's Chase is a high-speed, tricky action platformer. As Chiki and friends, you'll dash through beautiful lands filled with strange monsters, explosions, and magical portals. How far can you go?

Featuring:
• Action-packed, mobile-first 2-button play
• Over 25 powerful upgrades to wield
• Unlockable characters with unique fighting styles
• Delightful cast of shopkeepers
• Charming pixel art
• Rockin' soundtrack
• Endless, randomized levels filled with traps & surprises

Paid version also includes:
• Over 25 stylish hats to collect and wear!
• Rank up characters to equip 10 upgrades at once!

Best of all:
• No ads! Just me asking you nicely to buy the game :)
• No WiFi needed to play
• No push notifications
• No sign ups
